          <title>
            <string language="en">Sorting rocks</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sortieren der Felsen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trier des roches</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Classificando rochas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ordinamento delle roccie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταξινομώντας βράχοι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Clasificar rocas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This partially filled diagram shows how rocks can be grouped based on their texture.  This can be used in a labelling exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">granite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">non-porous</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">porous</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rock grouping</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sandstone</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erscheinen dieses gründeten teilweise gefüllte 
Diagramms, wie Felsen gruppiert werden können, auf ihrer 
Beschaffenheit. Dieses kann in einer beschriftenden Übung 
verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les expositions partiellement remplies de ce 
diagramme comment des roches peuvent être groupées ont basé sur 
leur texture. Ceci peut être utilisé dans un exercice 
étiquetant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As mostras parcialmente enchidas deste diagrama 
como as rochas podem ser agrupadas basearam em sua textura. Isto
pode ser usado em um exercício etiquetando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le esposizioni parzialmente riempite di questo 
schema come le roccie possono essere raggruppate hanno basato sulla 
loro struttura. Ciò può essere usata in un'esercitazione 
identificante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μερικώς γεμισμένο διάγραμμα επιδεικνύει πώς 
οι βράχοι μπορούν να ομαδοποιηθούν βασισμένος στη σύστασή τους. 
Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί σε μια άσκηση μαρκαρίσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las demostraciones parcialmente llenadas de este 
diagrama cómo las rocas pueden ser agrupadas basaron en su textura. 
Esto se puede utilizar en un ejercicio de etiquetado.</string>
          </description>
